message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for a quality product like this.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  $120 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $170. I believe that's a fair price considering the value this brings.
I'm still not sure about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
